source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.
source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts

items.title: Proud Grandpa Watercolour Painting for Everyone
items.headline: Go from a novice painter to a watercolourist with confidence with a litte guidance from Bev
objectives_summary: Review basic watercolour techniques and create a beautiful "Proud Grandpa" painting to be proud of!
Observe and paint the light and shadow contrast on the Grandpa and Grandson's skin and clothes
Learn a simple technique in transferring any reference onto a watercolour paper

items.title: Sunset Watercolor Painting For A Beginner
items.headline: Step by Step painting for beginners with Practice demos and project to create a beautiful sunset painting of your own.
objectives_summary: How to Paint a Sunset In Watercolor.
This class teaches you how to create layers, incorporate gouache into your watercolors, and utilize color in ways to effectively create layers to add depth.
This course is for all levels of watercolorist or crafty/creative folks looking to create.

items.title: The Figurative Drawing Course: The Legs- Anatomy to Drawing

visible_instructors.title: Alejandro Encisso
visible_instructors.job_title: For Those Who Have The Insaciable Need To Draw
visible_instructors.name: Alejandro

items.headline: learn to draw realistic legs, In this course we will study the anatomy of the legs focused for artists
objectives_summary: Anatomy of the legs
All about the bone structure of the legs
all about the Muscle structure of the legs

items.title: How to draw water with soft pastels
items.headline: Learn to draw water in your beautiful landscapes and seascapes
objectives_summary: How to draw water in seascapes
How to draw water in landscapes
How to draw different water textures

items.title: Build Your Jewelry Making Business
items.headline: Makers + Artists: Design and Sell Your Handcrafted Wearable Art
objectives_summary: Make Artisan Jewelry
Write an Effective Artist Bio
Sell Your Handcrafted Jewelry

items.title: Acrylic lesson - Wild roses in glass vase - Flower bouquet

visible_instructors.title: Ekaterina Fedorova
visible_instructors.job_title: Watercolor and Acrylic Artist and Art Tutor
visible_instructors.name: Ekaterina

items.headline: Step by Step real-time Painting Tutorial! You will paint flowers bouquet and learn acrylic techniques with this lesson!
objectives_summary: Discover how you can paint flowers: how to plan layers for it, what parts to paint and in what order, how to go from the general to the specific
Learn acrylic painting techniques: layering, blending, glazing, detailing, use of special brushes
Learn acrylic painting basics: values, color mixing, issue fixing

items.title: Practical technique in learning scenery watercolor.

visible_instructors.title: Ethan Lo
visible_instructors.job_title: Art Educator at Vox Art Studio
visible_instructors.name: Ethan

items.headline: Beginner friendly proven course for those without foundation in art but wish to learn immediately in painting scenery
objectives_summary: Learn the fundamental brush techniques in creating scenery art.
Learn to handle watercolor art tools efficiently.
Tips and tricks in creating certain environment asset

items.title: How to draw MANGA with CLIP STUDIO PAINT for Beginners!
items.headline: Let's take a peek at the work of a professional Japanese cartoonist with clip studio paint .
objectives_summary: How a professional Japanese cartoonist uses Clip Studio Paint to complete a comic page.
Many tips, tricks, and shortcuts to list here for beginners.
Efficient professional workflows that work for hobbyists and pros alike!

items.title: Master Watercolor Techniques And Paint Stunning Landscapes

visible_instructors.title: Mandar Marathe
visible_instructors.name: Mandar
visible_instructors.job_title: Fine Artist, Sculptor, Illustrator, and Engineer

items.headline: Learn by watching 3 complete demos with commentary
objectives_summary: Learn 6 techniques peculiar to watercolors
Learn how I use these techniques while painting the 3 complete demonstrations
You'll gain the confidence to paint landscapes using watercolors.

items.title: Paint a colorful, fluid & dramatic LAVENDER field. Watch me.

visible_instructors.title: Nicola A Blakemore
visible_instructors.name: Nicola A
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Artist, Teacher and Creative Entrepreneur

items.headline: Another lavender field watercolour painting for those wanting to get more fun from their paints. Lots of colour and fun.
objectives_summary: See how easy it is to paint in a less rigid style in watercolours.
Learn how to correct mistakes, even when using watercolour paints.
Learn how to use the white space of the paper on a tree to enhance light and shade.

items.title: How to Make Resin Geode Coasters

visible_instructors.title: Art School Online
visible_instructors.job_title: Online Education For Become a Better Artist
visible_instructors.name: Art

items.headline: Make beautiful resin geode coasters in two models
objectives_summary: In this course we will teach you to step by step tutorials with full details
The easiest way to create and craft beautiful resin geode

items.title: How To Draw Flowers Vol 2 - Daffodil, Poppy, Rose and More!
items.headline: Learn how to draw 5 Flower Pictures. Get AMAZING results with Pastel Pencils. Create art you can be proud of.
objectives_summary: How to use Pastel Pencil Techniques to Draw 5 Flower Pictures
Apply the light to dark rule when layering pastel tones
Be able to apply the techniques learnt to their own pictures

items.title: Oil Painting Education for Everyone
items.headline: SESSION ONE - French Impressionism; Bertha Morisot's 'Hollyhock Garden'
objectives_summary: The classical and historical elements of Impressionist oil painting as learned from the masters.
The fundamental techniques required to produce and oil on canvas painting.

Use of all materials required to learn the process. I will educate them on how to prepare my unique  "6 - value palette methodology" which allows them to create 1000’s of colors in multiple values. They will learn  about the the  four major stages  required to create a painting from blank canvas to framed artwork

items.title: Fine Art: Painting A Landscape With Oil Colors

visible_instructors.title: Mandar Marathe
visible_instructors.name: Mandar
visible_instructors.job_title: Fine Artist, Sculptor, Illustrator, and Engineer

items.headline: My simple process of landscape painting with oil colors
objectives_summary: Envision an oil painting based on a photo
Choose the right materials for the painting
Mix all the required shades of colors from few basic colors

items.title: How to turn a graphic t-shirt into a cosmetic bag
items.headline: Turn your favorite t-shirt into a cute zipper bag.
objectives_summary: You'll be able to take a graphic t-shirt and make it into a cute cosmetic bag.

items.title: How to Draw Lions, Tigers and Bears using Pastel Pencils
items.headline: Learn how to draw three stunning animal pictures using Pastel Pencils - an easy to pick up art medium that anyone can do
objectives_summary: How to use Pastel Pencil Techniques to Draw Lions, Tigers and Bears!
Apply the light to dark rule when layering pastel tones
Be able to apply the techniques learnt to their own pictures
